content.raw:
Hi Mr. Rivero,

Thanks for your help and sorry for not providing the complete info before. Here the details:

* drcsim info: drcsim_2.5 branch
* Modified the code? : Not at all
* gcc version: 4.7
* ROS version: Groovy
* System: Ubuntu 12.10, 64 bits
* Gazebo version: 1.8.0
* boost: 1.49

The terminal output is [here](http://pastebin.com/TE8ypsSA) and the CMakeOutput log is [here](http://pastebin.com/NW5NRv1T). 

Thanks again!
